title: New: Grace Lightman – White China (Raging Bull)
content:
Continuously blown away by the flawless vocal of London’s Grace Lightman.

White China (Raging Bull), the b-side to recent single, Faultless, finds her returning the track to it’s roots a little, keeping the intimate songwriting and her tender voice as the focal points. Lyrically it’s as heart-wrenchingly honest as we’ve come to expect from Lightman – ‘you know I’m porcelain / white china in your hands / impossible to hold‘; yet another hugely exciting step forward for the young songwriter.

Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
